body_html:
I ran into this issue out of the blue, and was really perplexed by the error, I hadn't changed anything in conda or pytorch since last time when it worked.

However, having installed llvm stack, which added itself to PATH, seems to trigger this problem, I suspect it's because it contains omp dlls, and pytorch in conda relies on finding them in a way that is only used after all PATH paths have been exhausted.

In any case, if anyone runs into this problem, check your PATH for any dlls that may have been added since last torch worked for you.

body:
I ran into this issue out of the blue, and was really perplexed by the error, I hadn't changed anything in conda or pytorch since last time when it worked.

However, having installed llvm stack, which added itself to PATH, seems to trigger this problem, I suspect it's because it contains omp dlls, and pytorch in conda relies on finding them in a way that is only used after all PATH paths have been exhausted. 

In any case, if anyone runs into this problem, check your PATH for any dlls that may have been added since last torch worked for you.
